content.detailedDescription: i was awaken in the early morning by a bright light that shined thru an opening thru my bed room window. that window was about 2.5' from the ceiling and 3' from the floor. covering the window was a ply-wood that only left an opening at the very top and it was about .5' gap. the total size of the window was about 5'. anyways, the first thought in my mind was "who are the cops after now"? when all of a suden a being came thru the window like a ghost. i felt fear and at the moment i was going to scream and loose it, it talked to me and said with my own voice inside my head "don't worry, relax everything's going to be ok". and i felt so relaxed all of a sudden. then she startwed to walk to me. i felt it was a female, she had long blondish hair, small opening for a nose aswell as moth and big dark eyes her skin was greish-green. i could'nt move anything but my eyes. thats when she messaged my bad knee, which was hurting me for year and only getting worst. finally i awoke not even thinking about what had happend . when i got up off my bed and realized my knee did not hurt anymore and until this day i'm fine. i don't know what happend only that it felt like a dream but my knee if fine. only questions rumble thru my head, like why thru the window not thru the wall, the knee of course, and why me?
content.summary: Realy bright light

content.detailedDescription:
It all started about 9:04am i saw a star that looked like it was moving... i dismissed it as an optical illusion till i noticed it was actually going across the sky immediately after my initial notice my girlfriend points to the right of where i was looking and there was another object closer and brighter going across the sky.  then soon after that there was a streak of white light parallel to the ground which i thought was a shooting star my girl friend disagreed.  utterly intrigued i remained outside head pinned upwards.  i live very close to travis air force base and almost instantly a get was scrambled and was circling around the circumference of the base round and round.  i saw 10 object in total over this hour long period the majority of them looked as though they were heading away from where i was observing past the base.  some of the objects would just move for a bit in then seem to swirl out into nothing, just disappear.  there were other planes out during the night and i can assure you these were no planes.

as all this was going on i kept trying to call all of my friends to see if they had seen anything i did find one that saw the one in the first set i saw.  it was a very interesting night to say the least.
content.summary: Bright stars moving about the sky

content.detailedDescription: I belaeve i have found a way in looking in another demention at the aliens and thir world not a joke. i just need someone to talk to and explane this to. i cant just tell you i need an investigator becouse i have showed to a couple of p. and they see what i`m seeing. ps plaese call me so we can talk thanks for your time.
content.summary: Better if explane to someone!

content.detailedDescription:
I was winding up the evening as a caregiver in a program home. i stepped outside on the patio to smoke a cigarette. it was a very clear and cool night and i enjoy looking at stars and sure, i often thought about seeing a ufo but all i ever seen were airplanes. i was looking straight west and then out of the corner of my left eye i see a very bright light at about 70 deg. coming from behind some trees toward the southwest and heading northeast toward ft. wayne. there were alot of planes earlier that night and i thought that was just what that was. i viewed it as a plane coming straight on with bright forward running lights. as it got closer to my position i realized there were no flashing collision lights at all. it was moving very smooth, very constant in a straight line.
   then when it was at 90 deg., directly over me, it was still a big bright light. i reasoned if it had been an airplane, those lights would have diminished but had not. the brightness was even maintained as it moved away from me heading northeast. i still waited to hear the sound of a jet engine but realized everything had been dead quiet the whole time. i just stood there and watched it as it moved out of sight.
content.summary: Bright white light moving from southwest to northeast. no sound.

content.detailedDescription:
At 10:45 pm i was on my deck and saw a light that looked like a shooting star landing on earth near gray or kingsport tennessee. this looked about 25 to 30 miles away. about 10 min later in the same area i seen a light thatgot real bright and faded out it did not move from the position it  just faded out. 5 min later two fighter jet flew ovewr in a v pattern one going toward asheville north carolina and the other toward knoxville tn fom my position. again i have reported this to the national ufo  site via phone. for some reason there is activity in the sky above my home.

i have sent the ufo hunters an email asking them if they would like to  film from my deck  because i live on a hill in the mountains of east tn.

i live 90 miles east of oak ridge tn.
i wish that i could get someones attention on this its very weird.
content.summary: Single light  no noise

content.detailedDescription:
I didn't acutally see thee event but i was on the phone with my girlfriend and she was freaking out

she explained it like an oval shaped light she said the color was like light pink

she said that it was the size of a large frying pan in the sky

she said that it moved fast and slowed down towards a corn field and moved down towards it   she said it was about as high as the trees around the field and then dissappered
content.summary: Even on the phone it made me very excited

content.detailedDescription:
While watching a fox newscast in the background at almost the end of the video, a ufo flys by only in a few frames. if you allready know about this 
good, i down loaded this video and have been showing it to my family and friends. every one of them has told me to do something with it. so here  i am. if you are interested.
i guarantee you you will be after seeing this video.
i am sending a portion of this video that i converted from flash to mpeg.
 i have the original flash file as shown on comcast cable.
if interested let me know
monte
content.summary: Ufo caught on a news cast (apparently unnoticed)

content.detailedDescription:
I was in flagler beach, fla., oct. 2003, approx. 9-9:30pm, at corner of rd 100 & a1a south, turned to look out to sea,
approx. 9-9:30 pm, flagler bch. fl. october 2003.Flat ovoid/round object heading east outward in ocean.  saw outer surface as "volcanic appearance",ie.:black & red as volcanic flow appearance, could see waves coming off left side(as i was north of object)as it slowly went down into ocean & outwardly to the east, i watched this object until out of my sight-about 2-3 minutes.  next day, new reports from daytona beach/ ormond beach,  of many sighting  "blue lights" going up coast northward from daytona beach.  there was no sound that night of motors, engines, no sound but of the ocean!!!!
content.summary: Flat ovoid object going east in atlantic ocean/florida

content.detailedDescription: Craft with 4 lights one at each corner forming a rectangle made a sweeping arch across the sky -  banking around from left to right, reshaping into a rhombus, trapazoid and finally into single line as it angled away from me towards to moon low in the sky, until only a single intensely bright bright light remained, and hovering in the sky.  sounded finely tuned, smooth consistant hydrallic like hummmm
content.summary: Rectangular object in flight

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my wife were showing off our new deck to our friend,we live on top of a hill in east tn and from the deck have a great view of the sky.

what we saw was no comet it had not trace of fire behind it and did not fade out it just kept flying across the entire sky until it faded away.
 the night was clear and you could see all the stars this object was round like a ball and faded off white. the ufo was so high in the sky it looked like it was flying near the stars but the circle was clear enough to see.

i wish i could have recorded this because we knew this was not a plane, comet or anything normal it was traveling north west it looked maybe like it was over ohio going west.

this is not a false sighting! i believe we are not alone and the government is keeping this education form us.

i sent this info to the ufo hunters on the history channel.

i uploaded an image of what it looked like.
content.summary: Faded circle no lights  it was not bright

content.detailedDescription: I woke up at about 1 am to tend to my infant who woke crying. on my way back to bed i passed by a window and noticed the fog and brightness on the moon outside. i stopped to look as i have seen things before . looking southeast i saw a bright star looking object about the size of a tic tac at arms length away. it was a warm yellow orange light hovering about 45% above horizon. it looked to be a lot closer that a star would appear and bigger. i would say about the height of most planes. i watched it for 15 minutes then showed my husband who didn't care. i felt ok observing it. i wish to be contacted by evelyn .I lost her number have her call me.
content.summary: Bright orange/yellow light hovering , not a star.

content.detailedDescription: I was going south on dixon road toward us 26 when up ahead in the sky in the distance, slightly to the left of dixon road was a glowing light. it was around 9:30 p.M. i was the person on april 17, 2008 who saw the orange orbs over the mall, so i went in pursuit of this object.  i had my three grown-up kids with me, my cousin, a friend and my grandbaby. since the road is closed off at dixon there and i could not go straight, i turned right on us 26.  i took the first road headed south.  i traveled appoximately 6 miles all the while observing this shimmering light in the sky.  we reached 200 north, around 700 west, tipton county.  we watched this object looking south while we were on 200 north. we all got out and my son started video taping while i used my sony cybershot 15x zoom camera.  i had my sony on the "sport option" to catch pictures in action.  i took around 50 total pictures. i also had my 15 x 70 celestron skymaster binoculars with me.  the object was barely moving, just above treetop level. to our eyes it appeared like a bright ball of light.  through the binoculars it appeared like a multi-colored object and looked similar to the person's video on youtube of the denver, indiana ufo.  but it would change.  looking at it in person it usually just appeared to be a large bright orb, but sometimes like two orange orbs.  on my sony camera, the pictures turned out like nothing at all we were observing in person. it seemed to have several orbs or organized lights attached to an object, yet we could see no object.  a couple of the pictures that have several lights has a bright light that almost looks like fire and smoke surrounding it. the object seemed to be approximately a mile south hovering near the top of the trees clusters. it would move slowly from one end of the trees and then come back from the opposite direction and then repeat this over and over. at one point the object was headed west and descended slowly behind the trees.  you can see the light of it as it traveled behind the trees. i had to take my son back to his vehicle so he could leave to go back to ohio since he had to go to work the following morning. it is around 11p.M. we went back the way we came.  just as we turned east on us 26 facing dixon road and to the right of us (south) was this big, low flying object.  the kids yelled for me to stop the van.  i pulled over quickly and we all jumped out.  my daughters looked through the binoculars as my son video taped it.  we could see this object traveling low at treetop level coming from the south/southwesterly direction. it headed northeast.  it flew over us 26 and looked to be flying over the apartments there.  my one daughter who was observing it through the binoculars said it had a band of white lights on it and a few red ones on the rear of it as if they were attached to an object, though she could not see the actual structure of it.  she said it was not an airplane.  my other daughter said it looked like several lights contained inside this glowing sphere of lights.  to me it appeared like a big ball of light that didn't change it's brightness no matter what angle you looked at it. there was no sound involved.  it was very close and low and i would have thought we should have heard something.  it was very windy that night though. after taking my son back to his car, my older daughter and i went back to the same road where we first observed this orb. it was around 1 a.M.  i saw it again and taped it a few seconds when my daughter suggested trying to get closer to it or under it.  i don't know the exact roads we traveled but we seemed to be getting closer since the light appeared bigger. we traveled south and west and arrived to a town that had the name of "watson" in it. we might have been near goldsmith. i was going to get out and take pictures, which i regret that i didn't now. one of the back country roads had an arrow to the east away from the object and when i got up to a road to bring me back to the west toward it, it was flying northwest at a great speed. the bright orb was quickly turning into a small light in the sky.  i tried to follow toward it and periodically would stop and take pictures toward it.  i ended up in russiaville, indiana and realize i had lost it. it was now appoximately 3:30 a.M. i decided to give up the chase.  i do have video and pictures. i hope it will help to solve or disclose something about this phenomenon.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Glowing, hovering bright sphere of light

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 9:30 i went to the kitchen to refill my glass of water. an intense bright star like light caught my attention through the window. it was a clear night and the full moon was not yet visible although the sky was getting light to the east. the light was really bright and looked blue/white. it appeared to be about 3 times the size of any stars. i opened the door to get a better look and decided that it was to big and too bright to be a star. the light appeared to be moving toward me at an angle. i went back inside to get my binoculars and called for my wife to come see it. when we got back outside the light had turned and was moving east. it very quickly disappeared. i did not get to see it through the binoculars as it was going too fast. my wife did get to see it for a bit before it went out of sight. i believe this may be the same as was reported in texas this same date. the times are about the same and the position and direction of travel also. if it is the same then whatever it was must have been very far away and very high. i am in north central arkansas on the missouri border.
content.summary: Intense blue/white light sse sky at 45 degrees moving toward me then turned east

content.detailedDescription:
The day before thanksgiving 1991 on sh 70 about 2 miles nw of frederick, md we were driving to penn for thanksgiving. i seen something 100 feet above the high wires it wasn't moving it was suspended in midair there was no sound . there were strobe like lights at first i thought it was a 
ch-47 chinook but it had no rotors. the highway is split on ether side cars were stopped there were 6 or 7 md. state troopers telling people they can't stop on the side of the road a lot of people stayed we went !
content.summary: I seen something 100 feet above the high wires it wasn't moving it was suspended in midair there was no sound

content.detailedDescription:
The image sticks in mind to this day from that night over 10 years ago. being twenty years old now, i remember in vivid detail where i was, where i was going, who i was with and what i saw in the sky that night. 
 while late in driving to my step-father's mothers house for what i remember to be a christmas dinner, i was with my mother as we drove through the dark highway going toward oxford. as we were riding i remember nagging my mother as most eight-year olds do, until we saw what appeared to be a reflection in the sky. the moon, placed at it's particular angle of night, happened to shimmer off what appeared to be a wide, triangular shape pointed by three stars. as i looked to my mother, who had been anxiously chewing a piece of gum in place of her cigarette, i noticed she was looking the same direction in the sky i was at the time. it was at that point, the reflection was clearly that of some sort of craft, which then disappeared in a single glance.
  together, my mother and i stopped what we were doing. i asked, "what was that mommy?", and her reply was, "i dunno son." i remember a slight fear, being replied by a boost of adrenaline as to the possibilities of what i saw that night.
  to this day, i remember the craft i saw that night. what it was, i dunno. i was eight-years-old and i know kids have an imagination... but when such a thing causes my mother to stop chewing her gum to keep quiet during my child-hood rants, it was definatly something.
 my mother will no longer acknowledge what we did infact see that night... but i know, and i know she knows... if anyone else saw it, i'm not to say. but what happened that night did happen, and i promise you it was not of this world.
content.summary: A sharp, gray, non-lit triangle

content.detailedDescription:
It was a hot summer day in july when a friend came by to show me his new car, and he asked me if i wanted to go and wash it with him?... i said yes because it was a new vet and i never drove one. 

after we did that we came back to my apartment and as he parked it under a tree, and as we stood there and talked about the car, a bird did its thing on it. you know what i mean...

my friend then asked me for a paper towel, so i went inside and as i walked out i told my friend lets look for that bird and do the same too him. as we laughed i looked up as if i was looking for the bird, and at this time was when i spotted this weird thing in the sky. i told juan to check this out, he didn't see it right away because remember his was cleaning his car. 

but then as we both stood there stunned from what we where looking at, time just flew by, and i didn't think nor did anyone mention to get a camera or recorder, i guess we where too shocked...I did call other people out it was a saturday's. we where all shocked...   

but as we all stood there looking at this thing, and as it started moving east on rt 22 in north plainfield, nj i ran inside and ask my pissed off wife if she knew where the recording camera was??? after 2 or 3 minutes of asking and yelling there was a ufo outside she told me, i wanted to have her up ducted, but of course by that time it was too far to film and beg for her upduction. just kidding...  everyone else kept watching this thing move away. 

once it moved to the east it stood still again and some other object seemed to had meet up with it. as we kept looking, by this time you could still see the ufos, i would say spinning, because every time we would see a bright silver glow from it. 

but as the other ufo flew on top i would say it was about 5 minutes it was over... they both vanished from our sights... as if they where never there.

this is my true store i have no reason at all to express this to you. i do tell my friends and they seem to believe me, but you know they really don't. 

i do swear on what i most love my daughter that what i saw that day was not of this world...

thank you 

bill muller
content.summary: Ufo over jersey!

content.detailedDescription:
This is a very famous group siting for montreal.  the date and time is so approximate because it was so long ago.  when i saw a documentary on television and it was mentioned it gave me chills because i had witnessed it too.

that evening i had gone for a ride on my bicycle as i usually did through the city looking for new places.  i would often do this sometimes with a friend.  this night i was alone and i had chosen the eastern section of the island.  i believe i started out going north and then east then south till i got to notre dame or sherbrooke street to head downtown before heading home.  when i was at approximately the imfamous 1976 olympic stadium i noticed some very bright lights in the west.  they were so bright that i thought that they were closer than where they actually were.  i thought it was some sort of festival or event going on so i rode towards them to observe and possibly participate.  however the light or lighted area seemed to come from the sky and station itself over a particular area that i could not find and i just kept riding towards what would be the center of it.  as i got closer it was clear that it was coming from downtown.  i found this very strange because with all the bright lights that are downtown this light was still brighter and extremely predominant.  finally i arrived on st jacques street and peel. that is approximately 8 miles from where i first noticed the light or lights.  it had seem to be directly over what was then called the "chateau champlain" hotel. i was puzzeled because there was no festival going on and the light seem to be coming from the sky. i drove around the area trying to find the source of light but it was in the sky and it stayed there even after i left.  at the time i was so perplexed because i had no answer to what i had witnessed in that last hour.  i remember riding away to go back home and kept looking back to take in what i had just witnessed.  all i remember thinking was "what was making that light?"  i knew downtown well as most of my rides would end up there.

that was my only encounter with an u.F.O.  i understand how it must be frustating to some people who have closer encounters and they are not believed. the experts can give me an explanation but i know what i experience and they could never convince me of anything other than what i witnessed.  they would have to reproduce it before i would believe them otherwise.  i'll never forget!  it was exhilerating!

little did i know that there were people on the roof of the hotel that witnessed it much closer than i and were very frightened.
content.summary: Hovered over the south eastern downtown part of the city for a very long time. very bright light, no sound.

content.detailedDescription: I can't remember the exact date but as i recall i had a light jacket on. the time is not exact either but it was before sunup. i had a paper route in peoria when i was 14 and was getting near the end and was just walking down the middle of the street with my paper bag and folding a paper up for the next house. i happened to be looking up in the sky which as i said was still dark. i remember it was mostly cloudy and beyond that i could see alot of stars then i was what i thought was a falling star because it had a tail on it and i though cool a falling star. but then a split second later i saw five more lights shoot across that opening in the clouds going in the same direction as the "falling star." so i've always wondered if what i thought was a falling star was something more like a ufo in trouble because as i said the first light had a tail on it whereas the other five did not.
content.summary: Ufo's chasing a ufo in distress

content.detailedDescription:
I was bored one night and thought that i would go revisit the old countryside to see whats all been done to it and see what has changed if anything. so i went for a drive in my celica and as i started up state route 48, i decided to make a left turn onto butterworth road. as i crested the hillside my car started to lose power and i was thinking that this was great, im out here in the boonies and my car decides to act up. so after saying a few choice words i pulled my car over to see what was wrong with it. as i was pulling over my car completely lost all lights and died on me. i opened my car door and popped open my hood and i heard a commotion in the field behind me. i turned around and yelled to try and frighten off any stray dogs and as i yelled there was a little more russling in the corn field and then i felt a slight breeze which turned into a strong gust of wind. it felt like when you stand in front of a powerful fan but to a much more extreme. there was hardly any noise and all of a sudden a massive dull light appeared. it wasnt blinding, it was more like looking at a lampshade when the light was turned on. then to my amazement this (for lack of a better word) craft raised up out of the corn field and and the lights on the front of this thing reminded me of a football stadium light array but not as bright...Not even close. it hovered for a second or two then slowly passed almost over top of me where i got a good look at the undercarriage of this thing. for some strange reason i wasnt scared, it felt normal almost, like it belonged there. the bottom of this craft had these neon like tubes that glowed softly and started out as white as a sheet. then there was a small humming sound, very faint but detectable in the outdoors where it was as quiet as a church mouse. the tubes started to change colors softly from white to yellow to orange then red. this seemed like it took a few minutes for it to do as it just hovered there. i watched in amazement at this sight thinking this has got to be my imagination but the breeze was constant and the debris from the road was moving around in a swirling pattern it seemed. i could feel my clothes being moved about as the wind rushed from this thing. the humming stopped and then it started upward slowly at first then it shot off like a dart turning completely red in coloration. it stopped and started bouncing a bit...Then it shot due east and came to a complete stop. then it looked like something hit it as it dove straight down. it came to another halt. then it made these zig-zag motions and then came to almost where it was before when it first shot off. it hung there for a few moments then took off east again and made these series of loop-de-loops and then came to a final halt before it darted off in a blink of an eye and became no longer visible. 
i cannot tell you how bewildered i am of this. i am open to ideas but i am normally very skeptical when it comes to some things. this has put most of my skeptical ideals out the window. i cannot explain it, i carry a camcorder and a camera around with me now at all times just in case something like this happens again. i am still dumbfounded yet i feel a sense of awe and a serious sense of underachievement as mankind. i was never scared...More like shocked at what i was witnessing. it truely was a spectacular moment in my life and i dont care if people believe me or not...But someone needs to know.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I think i startled it.

content.detailedDescription:
This event was witnessed and reported by many, including local tv channel 8.  sighting ocurred during evening rush hour traffic, near sunset.  
this ufo was, in fact, the us navy seal jumpfrogs skydiving team, doing training jumps over north island.  this was reported by local paper, led to navy posting training schedule, and was followed up by training jumps the following friday.  i heard the hoopla, and went to see it, as scheduled, two days later.
content.shape: Circle,  Cross,  Diamond,  Fireball,  Flash,  Sphere,  Star-like,  Triangle
content.summary: All san diego sightings 27 & 29 february 2008

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling from moose lake to cloquet on hwy 61.  i looked up from my windshield and saw a metallic object.  at first i thought it was a jet liner on approach to duluth.  as i gazed at it, i thought, there is no jet liner that big and no way would one be that low, as duluth airport is about 20 miles away.  as i watched it, it was kinda skimming the treetops at a moderate speed, when all of a sudden it just disappeared.  i don't think it sped up and away as much as it just dropped down below the trees.  there are several large forests of tall pines which could easily hide something of that size.  i watched it for perhaps 30 seconds before it disappeared.  i was close enough to not see any windows, wheels, or strobs of anykind.  my father was a pilot in the army and privately.  i have been around planes my entire life and also visited many air shows and aviation museums.  i have never seen anything like that metallic object before.  i was about 26 years of age, with 2 small children in the car and i tell you, i had goosebumps all over my body from that sighting.  would also like to note, that when i was about 12, my family and a friend of the family (a police officer) where camping down at grand lake in grove, ok.  it was dark, about 10 at night when we noticed a bright light off to the nw.  we watched this light travel around us in a semi circle (behind us) and we all tracked it.  my dad and his friend were trying to figure out what type of aircraft it might be.  as it circled around and came up in front of us, it suddenly stopped, hovered for about 15 seconds, then shot straight up and out of sight.  i turned around to question my dad and him and his friend were both wide eyed with mouths open.  then my dad said, that was no aircraft, and his friend agreed.  what did we see?  i don't know, but i know that no airplane, helicopter or weather ballon could do what it did.
content.summary: Traveling by car, saw a metalic object in sky, thought it was a jet liner.  too low and too big

content.detailedDescription: I was outside smoking a cigarette, looking at the sky, noticed a light,bright star, then noticed it was moving, coming from sse, thought aircraft landing lights, no strobes, no sound, came closer and much brighter, aprox. 5 hand widths above horizon turned e. and from a bright light gradually out of sight, never any sound or strobes,sighting lasted 3 to 4 minutes, moon had not risen,
content.summary: Saw a light thought was star, then moving, thought aircraft, no sound.

content.detailedDescription:
Sitting down for lunch around midday.  a sandwich and a glass of fruit juice. looking out the picture window to the back field, when i noticed a hovering object about 5 inches across.  it was approzimately seventy five feet away and hovering about 4 feet off the ground, appeared like a spinning silver egg.  at first i didn't pay it to much attention thinking it was an eastern phoebe, a type of flycatcher that is common in the area.  the phoebe's are a joy to watch as they leave there perch on a limb and fly out a few feet and hover to catch insects on the wing. anyway, i soon noticed that the object was not a bird and i watched it spin like an egg, when it started to change shape and color.  slowly it changed from the spinning egg wobble to a disk of the same size and it appeared that it had dark markings or windows around it that created a grey band against the reflective silver, as it was spinning quite fast.  as i watched it for about 4 minutes it began to slowly rise above the 4 foot elevation, ever so slowly but with an acceleration so that as it moved incrementally higher it moved ever faster until it reached about 15 feet above the ground and it dissappeared.  my assumption is that it continued in the straight vertical direction of it's original trajectory and simply moved so fast as to disappear in the blink of an eye.  my first thought after it disappeared was that i should have waved hello.  i didn't tell anyone for a few months, because i have no proof and wondered what people would think of me.  the thing is: i know i saw it, i know it was real and not an apparition.  as i watched it, i  studied it for explanation against all my experience and it remained as it was; a hovering, spinning silver egg/disk about 5 inches across and 3 inches high, 4 feet above a mowed grass field, 15 feet in front of an evergreen cedar tree.  i had a peaceful feeling after it left, a feeling that i was lucky to see such an unusual thing, a thing that really exists, but of which i have no explanation of it's origin.  months later upon telling a close friend of the siting, he said he thought it was "one of ours" a "military drone or probe".  i don't think anyone can know what it was.
it was unique.  it was real.  i saw it.
content.summary: 5 inch diameter spinning, hovering silver egg/disk

content.detailedDescription:
This is not a ufo event, rather an accounting of a counseling session accidentally interrupted.  the year was 1967, because i had just listened to the new beatles: magical mystery tour lp that evening for the first time. 

my father was a minster named: rev. lawrence veltkamp, from grand rapids, michigan, shawnee park, christian reformed church. that summer he was doing mission work near tacoma, wash. in a small crc church that had lost it's pastor and could not replace him.  we lived an a dairy farm called faith dairy, where i cut the grass and helped milk cows for the summer. 

one sunday a decorated military person, a male deacon of the church, (don't remember the name), invited my father, my mom and me over to dinner.  i was about 14 years old and he had a son my age. after dinner his son invited me to listen to the new beatles album, which we did.  when we were done i went downstairs to get something from the kitchen.  i entered the living room to hear my father in a very serious conversation with the military guy. when i entered my father raised his hand for the man to stop, but the man did not stop talking.  (there is a prohibition against having your family hear counseling sessions if you are a minister.  it is supposed to be private.)  

but i was already in the room and the military guy was saying: "but i saw them, and the others with me saw them also!" my father responded with: "well you just couldn't have because those things don't exist. it's just impossible." 

"no, it's not impossible because we all saw them and we talked about it afterwords. so how can i have faith in the bible when there is no mention of this in the bible? i mean how could god overlook something so important as space people?  this has wrecked my faith.  i really need to have an answer about it. "  

to which my father nervously replied again that "well, i'm sure you thought you saw something, but you just couldn't have seen that" by this time my father was flagging me out of the room, i was walking slowly to the kitchen and didn't realize what i was hearing, but i could see one thing.  my father was more visibly upset than i had ever seen him.  it was my father's face that caused me to remember the event all these years.  he had a look of shear panic and confusion and desperation, like i had never seen in the fourty years i knew him. 

on the way out the door, there, while still on their sidewalk, i asked him what that was all about? and my father just made a sharp guesture with his hand to shut up.  so in the car on the way home i asked again what he had been talking about and he said "oh nothing,  just some experiences from the airforce.  

the problem with this explanation is that it didn't account for the shaking in my father's voice and hands as he tried to drive.  looking back on this event with what we know today. it must have been one of the earlier accounts of not just a ufo, but probably the airforce's detention of actual aliens, as we suspect from roswell.  a ufo sighting alone could not have produced the emotion that i saw in these two men.  i never saw a conversation knock my father out of his orbit like that one did, either before or since that fateful night, and we never spoke of it again.  

i have told friends and family about this through the years, but i have never gone public due to the lack of facts and names, but it feels good to tell somebody.  maybe it will collaborate something from the tacoma, wa. area someday, who knows. 

sincerely,  loren veltkamp
content.summary: I overheard military commander confess to my father, a minister.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on the beach with my date.  it had been dark for half hour or so (after sundown).  we saw 3 or 4 military type helicopters about 1/4 mile off shore shining their lights in the water.  i figured it was a training exercise of some kind.  as we watched for a few minutes, i noticed a black shape that moved off-shore along the beach in front of us, no lights on the object but there was a strange effect with surrounding light.  it was considerably larger than the helicopters.  there was no sound i could detect, although you could hear the helicopters further in the distance.  hard to tell exactly what shape it was.

we both saw it and agreed it was strange with no lights or noise. seemed to travel faster than the helicopters, but may have been an illusion as it was closer.  it seemed like light may have passed through it, but can't be sure.  some type of distortion of light.  

we had a few beers at dinner, but we were not drunk or under influence of any other substance.

i felt exhilaration, no fear.  it passed by quickly so there was no time to be afraid.

no physical evidence.
content.summary: Silent dark object off the beach

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling from panama city, florida on highway 98 toward fort walton beach. when i was around the seaside, fl area, i noticed these two patterns in the sky.  when i reached the 331 bridge about five minutes later, i noticed the pattern still in approximately the same place.  i worked at the central control facility at eglin, so at first i thought it was a night mission.  when i reached the mid bay bridge, i decided to try to get closer to the formation and went over the bridge on my way to fort walton instead of taking 98 all the way home.  i followed it all the way to the eglin range gate near bluewater elementary and when i was almost directly underneath it, i rolled down my windows hoping to confirm it was six helocopters in formation.  i was stunned when i heard complete silence.  i don't know what type of aircraft can appear to move so slowly and not producec any sound.  i am trying to reach the person i was meeting in panama city to confirm an exact date.  i think that this was on a friday or saturday night.  the following week i checked the missions and there were no night missions that were flown that weekend, at least not at my clearance level that i would be able to find out about.  i never really mentioned this to anyone until i saw other footage of the almost identical phenomenon that i had seen.  i assumed it was something with the air force base ad never really thought much else of it.  i think it is important to report this for historical reference.  i hope to have confirmation on the date of occurrance soon.
content.summary: Two sets of 3 lights. each set in an isosceles shape silent and moving slowly

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog late at night. it was winter and mostlycloudy. i looked up in the sky and throug a break in the clouds i could see a fairly large oval shaped light, appearing about the size of a nickle held out at arms length. it was bright but had a soft glow. and though it would probably be considered white it had a strong blue hue to it. it was moving but not very quickly. it appeared to be pretty far away. i felt scared because i couldn't think of an explanation for what it was, nothing seemed to fit.I could immediatly rule out the possibility that it was a plane, satelite, or just lights from the city which often appear in the winter. it was much to bright and clearly shaped to just be from city lights. i am used to all of the possibilities i could think of and it wasn't any of these. even my dog took notice that there was something odd in the sky. after a few minutes it dissapeared behind the clouds and i couldn't see it anymore.
content.summary: A large, slowly moving, blue-white oval shaped glow appeared in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
While driving from st. pete beach, fl to key west on interstate 75, my two friend's and i saw 3 dark colored object's racing across the sky toward's the west, into a dark thunderhead cloud, just before we reached naple's, fl at approximately  3:00 p.M..  upon arrival in key west, where we were living at the time, we turned on the evening news out of miami, fl. we heard a report on the newscast of object's being detected on radar that came on screen over the naple's, fl area, streaked over toward's miami, fl, and down toward's key west, fl, before going off radar. no explaination was given to what these object's were on the newscast. that evening we went to the atlantic shore's motel that had an outside bar and dock that went out into the atlantic ocean. it was a very hot and humid night, and after purchasing our first drink, we walked out to the end of the dock because there was a breeze over the water. no light's were at the end of the dock, and no other light's were nearby, so it was dark looking out towards the atlantic ocean. suddenly a bright blue light/sphere appeared high in the sky and was not moving. i saw the object first and alerted my two friend's who began looking at the bright blue light/sphere with me. suddenly, the bright blue light/sphere seemed to fall straight down to what we thought would be the horizon and remained motionless for about 30 second's, and then the bright blue light/sphere quickly raced across the water and up into the night sky with incredible speed and out of our eye sight. the next day i told a co-worker i had seen something last night that she would not believe, and before i could tell her what i had seen with my friend's, she blurted out "oh my god, did you see that blue light last night"?  she had been sitting outside of her apartment, which was on the atlantic ocean, with her dog, and saw the exact bright blue light/sphere that myself and my 2 friend's saw, and at the exact same time. knowing that there is a large air force base in key west, we immediately dismissed this as any air force craft because it suddenly appeared from out of nowhere, remained motionless for approximately 30 second's, fell rapidly toward's the water and remained motionless for about 30-45 second's, then rapidly raced in a straight line across the water and up into the sky and out of our eye sight in a matter of 10 second's or less.
since myself and my two friend's had seen the three dark object's racing toward's the dark thunderhead over the everglade's that afternoon, and hearing the report on the miami newscast, and the bright blue light/sphere that evening, we all three thought we had again seen a single bright blue light/sphere that sped as quickly as the dark colored object's we had seen that very afternoon, just north of naples, fl. 
especially the next day, when i went to tell my co-worker about the event that previous evening, and she blurting out what i had seen with my two friend's, was just comfirmation for all four of us, that it could not have been an aircraft because of the way it appeared suddenly, and the speed at which it moved, when it did move.
myself and my two friend's came to the conclusion that what we had seen just before we reaced naples, fl, heard on the evening newscast, and what we saw at atlantic shore's motel, were related somehow, and it was something that we had never seen before, or since, and we lived in key west for 5 year's.
content.summary: Seen by myself and two other friend's and co-worker

content.detailedDescription:
Objects that seemed to be as high as a star was moving back and forth in a striaght line at fast speeds as if a star was moving from one side of the sky to another in different directions.  to this day can not explain what it was an i don't even bother looking into the sky for long periods of time because i know that there is something out there.

1. i was in a park with a friend, looking up at the sky.
2. i noticed the objects when they started to move back and forth as if the stars where toys and could be placed where ever they wanted to be place
3. i thought i was looking at the stars then noticed that a couple of the bright objects were moving, they were not planes i saw those moving about, they were not even close to this planet they were far away.
4.The objects moved from one place to another usually fast motion, it was not shooting stars, i kept my eye on them and they were moving back and forth.  i believe shooting stars just race across the whole sky these stayed in one area of the sky moving back and forth not dissappearing.  they didn't move every minute it moved with intelligence not as a machine.
5.I was and still am shocked but not so surprised knowing that i can not prove it but knowing what i saw explains more than what ever sightings occured on earth and thought to be a hoax.  know one to my knowledge has traveled as far as these objects so they can not really explain it or give scientific explanation.  i believe that what we do know is that there are other planets, universes, etc. besides earth how could someone be so selfish to believe that we are the only living beings.  these objects were far and looked like stars in the sky when they were still.  they moved back and forth with intelligence.  i do not have any mental illnesses or believe in the tooth fairy.  i believe in reality and the reality is that there is a thing called space and there are other intelligent beings out there wheter it be ants or snails.
6. i stoped watching the sky and the movements became less and less so i stoped.  i tell people i know about it besides there was about ten other people there who saw it. its just something that happened that your like wow, who could ever explain that. i know that whatever it was it was intelligent.  i wish someone had a video camera to catch it on tape.  finally i fell like this true unbelievable to some story in my life can be put to use, thanks.
content.summary: Any response/ post on web blog

content.detailedDescription: my friend  and i were going to my mothers ,home in meredith center, to hear gospel singers ,my son was in the back seat his age about 4-5 yrs old. we were coming down 93 south from ashland n.H, we see flashing lights to the right  of us , many colors. a round shape at the time. some cars were pulled over looking,at it. if i remenber right it was    dark. as i got to the new hampton exit on 93. and pulled off this thing was in front of me. hovering with alot of lights. a car pulled up behind us , and backed off fast went toward bristol.We could see it so clear. it was really landing in front of us. my friend was yelling i want to see in the windows ,i was saying omg,omg, my son was in the back seat crying.Then it was what i will call landing gear was coming down. there was like three i could see. i said no way im out of here and floored the car. but her and i both seem to remenber ,it seemed like when i pulled out .I was then on the north bound exit. i went under the overhead bridge she was yelling i want to see inside the windows. i pulled into the old gararge  , at the time it was still there but now more of a boomerange,shape i run inside the garage asked the men to come out and see if im seeing what i am or crazy they came out, and were shocked saying what ta ..-- is that, my friend was already out of the car looking . there was a space between the garage and some trees. it turned on its side my god it was huge, made no sound what so ever,none and we could of reached out and touched it. had strange desinges on it. and lights. so huge with no sound at all. it went in back of the garage , and shot off, the men couldn;t beleave it we told them how it followed us down 93, we got into the car again heading down 104 to my parents in meredith center. . as we got down the road some, it came back beside us. and followed us to just in meredith center and shot across the road in front of us ((ole back road)) got to my moms told my dad he said take me out maybe we can see it again. i didn't want to see it again, but i took him. we didn;t see it. my mother had me call wlnh radio station and tell them. either they called the airforce or i did, i forgot now..  some reporter came to see us talked with us seperate including my son, and had us draw pictures of what we see.  that week in the paper it read many others see the boomerange also, ( many others). in meredith. after that its as if we knew when they were around because we could go right to were we would see one for like maybe a few years after, and my friend and i both had some dreams the same. . there are times now i wish i had let someone hypnotisem  me because of missing time, and also her and i having the same dreams , also knowing when they were around.  of course people inour home town read about us in the paper, and made fun of us all the time. would make prank phone calls.  to this day my son remenbers nothing about it.  but her and i do and have, always wished we knew more if anything happened to us or not.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: like time lost.. many people see it , went to garage men inside came out to see it
